description: Intelligence/classified information features - THE #1 MOST PREDICTIVE FEATURE
chroma_query_template: classified information intelligence state secret national security {case_context}

recommendations.critical: If applicable, mention intelligence sources, classified information, state secrets, or confidential materials in the context of national security.
recommendations.rationale: This is THE #1 MOST PREDICTIVE FEATURE (importance: 17.01) for successful sealing motions. CatBoost analysis shows intel/classified indicators are the strongest predictor.
recommendations.example: The case involves classified information and intelligence sources that, if disclosed, would harm national security.
recommendations.insight: Successful motions explicitly mention intelligence/classified information when applicable. This is the single most important feature.

suggestions: Mention 'classified information', 'intelligence', 'state secret', or 'confidential' if applicable
Place in Factual Background or National Security section
